short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use your keys to compose songs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keyposer lets you compose songs using text! Any text can be turned into music. It comes prepackaged with 62 .wav files for experimenting and creating loops to start but you are also able to add custom .wav files to your extension and create almost any loop! Keyposer also lets you save your songs as .txt files for later improvements. No internet connection required.
